item.description:
The March meetup will revolve around ancient pre-socrates philosophers. The discussion will be based on who these great minds where and their ideas. Now most of these very old thoughts have been proven wrong due to the fact of advancing technology but to know what philosophy is today means knowing what is was when it started out. We will be examining the individuals that inspired Plato, Pyrrho, and the Stoics.

This also helps the beginner with the history of philosophy but note this is not meant to be a class lecture.

Agenda

The First Philosophers

Thales
Anaximander
Anaximenes
Heraclitus
Pythagoras
Xenophanes
Parmenides
Empedocles
Leucippus
Anaxagoras
Protagoras
Zeno of Elea


Note there will be a some whta brief but some what detailed outline on these guys on the message baord soon. Also please compared, if you don't know who any of these people are please find out or read my outline when it is finished so that you arenot left out of the discussion.
item.name: Meet the Classics!- part one
